column4: I want to get a list of fixes/updates which have been applied to the fglrx package.  I only just installed it, and I don't know how to ask apt/dpkg to tell me historical changes.
pity there have been no updates since I last tried it...  I was hoping resume might have been fixed  :(
for apt need apt-log or a bash-scrpt, but dpkg has : /var/lib/dpkg/infoÂ
